hillbillies.model.unit

Class FallActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.FallActivity

  • class FallActivity
extends Activity
    The activity for falling, is a subclass of MoveActivity.

    • Method Detail

      • startFalling

        void startFalling()
        Start the falling.
        Postcondition:
        The start position will be set.
            new.getStartPosition() == this.getUnit().getPosition()
        Effect:
        Set the unit's speed.
            this.getUnit().setSpeed(FallActivity.FALL_SPEED)

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the falling activity for a given time step.
        Specified by:
        advanceTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        dt - The time step to update with.
        Postcondition:
        Moves the unit down with the falling speed, if the new position is above a solid cube or the world ground, the unit will take damage equal to 10 times the amount off cubes he has traveled. Else the unit will keep falling and his position will be set to the new position.
        Effect:
        Sets the position of the unit to the new position.
            unit.setPosition(newPosition)

      • canSwitch

        boolean canSwitch()
        Returns whether the unit can switch activities.
        Specified by:
        canSwitch in class Activity
        Returns:
        Always false.
            result == false

      • switchActivity

        void switchActivity(Activity newActivity)
        Doesn't do anything. The fallActivity can't be interrupted.
        Overrides:
        switchActivity in class Activity
        Parameters:
        newActivity - The new Activity the unit will execute.

      • reset

        @Raw
void reset()
        Resets the fall activity.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Activity
        Postcondition:
        The start position will be cleared.
            new.getStartPosition() == null
